text: “The tabernacle itself you are to make with ten curtains of fine twisted linen and blue and purple and scarlet; you are to make them with cherubim that are the work of an artistic designer.

The <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> is to be <st data-num="08083 06242 0520" class="">42 feet</st>, and the <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> is to be <st data-num="0702 0520" class="">6 feet</st><n id="2" />—the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">size</st> for <st data-num="03605" class="">each</st> of the <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st>.

<st data-num="02568" class="">Five</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> are to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="02266" class="">joined</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0802" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">another</st>,<n id="2" /> and the other<n id="3" /> <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> are to be <st data-num="02266" class="">joined</st>, <st data-num="0802" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">another</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> of <st data-num="08504" class="">blue material</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="07098" class="">end</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> in <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02279" class="">set</st>, and <st data-num="03651" class="">in the same way</st> you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> loops<n id="1" /> in the outer <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="07020" class="">end</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> in the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="04225" class="">set</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> on the <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st>, and you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> on the <st data-num="07097" class="">end</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> is on the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="04225" class="">set</st>, so that the <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> are <st data-num="06901" class="">opposite</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">another</st>.<n id="1" />
You are to make 50 gold clasps and join the curtains together with the clasps, so that the tabernacle is a unit.
“You are to make curtains of goats’ hair for a tent over the tabernacle; you are to make 11 curtains.

The <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> is to be <st data-num="07970 0520" class="">45 feet</st>, and the <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> is to be <st data-num="0702 0520" class="">6 feet</st>—the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">size</st> for the <st data-num="06249 06240" class="">11</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st>.

You are to <st data-num="02266" class="">join</st> <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> by <st data-num="0905" class="">themselves</st> and <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> by <st data-num="0905" class="">themselves</st>. You are to <st data-num="03717" class="">double over</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="08345" class="">sixth</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="04136 06440" class="">front</st> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="07020" class="">end</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> in <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02279" class="">set</st> and <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> that joins the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="02279" class="">set</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="07165" class="">clasps</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="07165" class="">clasps</st> into the <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> and <st data-num="02266" class="">join</st> the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> <st data-num="02266">together</st> so that it <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="0259" class="">unit</st>.<n id="1" />

Now the <st data-num="05629" class="">part</st> that <st data-num="05736" class="">remains</st> of the <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>—the <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> that <st data-num="05736" class="">remains</st> will <st data-num="05628" class="">hang over</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="0268" class="">back</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>.<n id="1" />

The foot and a half on the one side and the foot and a half on the other side of what remains in the length of the curtains of the tent will hang over the sides of the tabernacle, on one side and the other side, to cover it.
“You are to make a covering for the tent out of ram skins dyed red and over that a covering of fine leather.
“You are to make the frames for the tabernacle out of acacia wood as uprights.

Each<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> is to be <st data-num="06235 0520" class="">15 feet</st> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> is to be <st data-num="0520 02677" class="">27 inches</st> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>,

with <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">projections</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0259" class="">per</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> <st data-num="07947" class="">parallel</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">another</st>.<n id="2" /> You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">in this way</st>.

So you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> for the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>: <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> for the <st data-num="05045 08486" class="">south</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>,<n id="1" />

and you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> to go <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>—<st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> for its <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">projections</st>, and likewise<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">next</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> for its <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">projections</st>;

and for the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="06763" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>, the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>,

and their <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st>, and <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">next</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st>.

And for the <st data-num="03411" class="">back</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> on the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st><n id="1" /> you will <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> for the <st data-num="04742" class="">corners</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> on the <st data-num="03411" class="">back</st>.

At the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="04740" class="">corners</st><n id="1" /> they must <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="08382" class="">doubled</st> <st data-num="04295" class="">at the lower end</st> and <st data-num="08535" class="">finished</st> <st data-num="03162" class="">together</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="07218" class="">top</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">ring</st>. <st data-num="03651" class="">So</st> it will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> for <st data-num="08147" class="">both</st>.
So there are to be eight frames and their silver bases, sixteen bases, two bases under the first frame, and two bases under the next frame.
“You are to make bars of acacia wood, five for the frames on one side of the tabernacle,

and <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="01280" class="">bars</st> for the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> on the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="06763" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>, and <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="01280" class="">bars</st> for the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> on the <st data-num="03411" class="">back</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> on the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st>.

The <st data-num="08484" class="">middle</st> <st data-num="01280" class="">bar</st> in the <st data-num="08432" class="">center</st> of the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> will <st data-num="01272" class="">reach</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="07097" class="">end</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07097" class="">end</st>.<n id="1" />

You are to <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st> the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> with <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> their <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> to provide <st data-num="01004" class="">places</st> for the <st data-num="01280" class="">bars</st>, and you are to <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st> the <st data-num="01280" class="">bars</st> with <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>.
You are to set up the tabernacle according to the plan that you were shown on the mountain.
“You are to make a special curtain of blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and fine twisted linen; it is to be made with cherubim, the work of an artistic designer.

You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">hang</st> it<n id="1" /> with <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="02053" class="">hooks</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> of <st data-num="07848" class="">acacia wood</st> <st data-num="06823" class="">overlaid</st> with <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, set <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>.

You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">hang</st> this <st data-num="06532" class="">curtain</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="07165" class="">clasps</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">in</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">behind</st> the <st data-num="06532" class="">curtain</st>.<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="06532" class="">curtain</st> will <st data-num="0914" class="">make a division</st> for you <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="06944" class="">Holy Place</st> and the <st data-num="06944" class="">Most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">Holy Place</st>.<n id="2" />

You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st> in the <st data-num="06944" class="">Most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">Holy Place</st>.
You are to put the table outside the curtain and the lampstand on the south side of the tabernacle, opposite the table, and you are to place the table on the north side.
“You are to make a hanging for the entrance of the tent of blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and fine twisted linen, the work of an embroiderer.
You are to make for the hanging five posts of acacia wood and overlay them with gold, and their hooks will be gold, and you are to cast five bronze bases for them.
